Gangsters threaten your life if you do not return the $ 8 million he stole them. The problem is that Robert has no idea what it is. Observing the scene, he discovers Sam (Peter Facinelli) under a pile of boxes in a corner, beaten and wounded. As the two men struggle to survive before freezing to death, the truth about their real situation is soon revealed.
